sys_openapi_operation.name: Returns assets which meet the given criterias.
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation: {"fName":"Returns assets which meet the given criterias.","fOperationId":"getAssets","fDescription":"This API returns a list of assets. By default the following fields are included: id, name (text), etag and state (archived). You can use various parameters to filter this list or to retrieve other fields from the assets. In Asset Management, paging is missing deliberately. You can request assets that would be on the next page by adding a filter for the \u0027text\u0027 or \u0027name\u0027, and specifying the last object by its \u0027text\u0027 or \u0027name\u0027 in the loaded dataset: $filter\u003dname gt \u0027the_last_objects_name_or_text\u0027","fPath":"/assetmgmt/assets","fHttpMethod":"GET","fDeprecated":false,"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"On successful query","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson6479927729","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/GridAssetStructureResponse","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"206","fDescription":"First 50 assets on successful query","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson4998362448","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/GridAssetStructureResponse","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"403","fDescription":"When user doesn\u0027t have \u0027read\u0027 permission for the asset type.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"nameFragment","fDescription":"To filter assets by their name-fragment use this parameter. It\u0027s case-insensitive.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"nameFragment0866788021","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]},{"fName":"searchTerm","fDescription":"To filter assets by their name-fragment or any fragment in their text or number type fields. It\u0027s case-insensitive.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"searchTerm1547179803","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]},{"fName":"templateId","fDescription":"To filter assets by a specific template. It\u0027s possible to give a comma separated list of field id-s of assets.The following fields are relevant for all assets: name, specification, @@summary, modificationDate, creationDate. If value is \u0027default_grid_fields\u0027 it returns default grid fields with more meta information.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"fields3159900816","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]},{"fName":"showAssignments","fDescription":"When it\u0027s given it returns more meta information, including all person and location related assignments. See \u0027/assignments\u0027 endpoint documentation for more details about the response format.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"showAssignments4038231734","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"boolean","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"boolean"}}]},{"fName":"linkedTo","fDescription":"Entity type and id of the entity the assets were linked to, separated by a slash character (accepted values: person, personGroup, branch, location, incident, changeActivity, knowledge, change, problem, omActivity, omSeries). Can be present only with linkedTo when only one instance exists and it doesn\u0027t have entityId. (This parameter will be removed in one of the subsequent versions of the API. Use linkedTo instead.)","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"linkedToId6637249208","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]},{"fName":"assetStatus","fDescription":"To filter assets by their status. Possible values: OPERATIONAL, IMPACTED.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"assetStatus8395844604","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]},{"fName":"$filter","fDescription":"Supports a limited set of simple odata filters. Filtering assets based on the objectid field with greater-than operator (Ex $filter\u003dname gt \u0027My Object\u0027). Filtering assets based on date fields with greater-than, or less-than operator. Dates are interpreted as UTC dates (Ex $filter\u003dmodificationDate gt \u00272017\u0027 and modificationDate lt \u00272017-05-26\u0027). Supported formats: yyyy (2017); yyyy-MM (2017-12); yyyy-MM-dd (2017-12-25); yyyy-MM-dd\u0027T\u0027HH:mm (2017-12-25T18:30); yyyy-MM-dd\u0027T\u0027HH:mm:ss (2017-12-25T18:30:12); yyyy-MM-dd\u0027T\u0027HH:mm:ss.SSS (2017-12-25T18:30:12.798). Filtering based on a linked entity. Ex $filter\u003dlinkedTo eq \u0027incident/2eebf650-c5d7-4bf3-ad05-1f4cbced3b06\u0027. Filtering based on a text field. Use the \u0027contains\u0027 operator. Ex $filter\u003dspecification contains \u0027desk\u0027. Filtering based on a checkbox field on false and true values. Ex $filter\u003dtermsandconditions eq \u0027false\u0027. Filtering based on a number field. Ex $filter\u003dcost eq 15, $filter\u003dcost ge 40. Filtering based on a dropdown field. Ex $filter\u003ddropdown-field eq \u00272eebf650-c5d7-4bf3-ad05-1f4cbced3b06\u0027. ","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"$filter1325317395","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]}]}
sys_openapi_operation.sys_name: Returns assets which meet the given criterias.
